languages.text: "Так и есть. Представьте себе, ревущее пламя, все системы корабля отказали — в том числе искусственная гравитация, — впереди ничего не разобрать из-за раскаленных обломков, а в любую секунду произойдет взрыв. В этом аду надо эвакуировать паникующий экипаж, устранить причину пожара и наладить функции отсека".

"That's right. Picture flames roaring, all the ship's systems have failed — including the artificial gravity — you can't make out anything because of the red-hot debris, and you know an explosion is coming. It's a nightmare, but it's your job to evacuate the panicked crew, eliminate the cause of the fire, and get the compartment back in working order."
languages.original_text: "Так и есть. Представьте себе, ревущее пламя, все системы корабля отказали — в том числе искусственная гравитация, — впереди ничего не разобрать из-за раскаленных обломков, а в любую секунду произойдет взрыв. В этом аду надо эвакуировать паникующий экипаж, устранить причину пожара и наладить функции отсека".

traits.locale_text: "That's right. Imagine roaring flames, all the ship's systems have failed, including artificial gravity, you can't make out anything because of the red-hot debris, and you know an explosion is coming. This is hell, but you must evacuate the panicked crew, eliminate what's causing the fire and get the compartment back into working order."

"That's right. Imagine roaring flames, all the ship's systems have failed, including artificial gravity, you can't make out anything because of the red-hot debris, and you know an explosion is coming. This is hell, but you must evacuate the panicked crew, eliminate what's causing the fire and get the compartment back into working order."

"That's right. Picture flames roaring, all the ship's systems have failed — including the artificial gravity — you can't make out anything because of the red-hot debris, and you know an explosion is coming. You're in hell, but it's your job evacuate the panicked crew, eliminate the cause of the fire, and get the compartment back in working order."

"That's right. Picture flames roaring, all the ship's systems have failed — including the artificial gravity — you can't make out anything because of the red-hot debris, and you know an explosion is coming. You're in hell, but it's your job evacuate the panicked crew, eliminate the cause of the fire, and get the compartment back in working order."

"That's right. Picture flames roaring, all the ship's systems have failed — including the artificial gravity — you can't make out anything because of the red-hot debris, and you know an explosion is coming. It's a nightmare, but it's your job to evacuate the panicked crew, eliminate the cause of the fire, and get the compartment back in working order."

"That's right. Picture flames roaring, all the ship's systems have failed — including the artificial gravity — you can't make out anything because of the red-hot debris, and you know an explosion is coming. It's a nightmare, but it's your job to evacuate the panicked crew, eliminate the cause of the fire, and get the compartment back in working order."

languages.text: « Oh, oui. Imaginez un peu : des flammes jusqu'au plafond, tous les systèmes du vaisseau en carafe, y compris la gravité artificielle, impossible de voir plus loin que le bout de son nez à cause des débris incandescents, sans même parler de la menace d'une explosion imminente... C'est nager en plein cauchemar, me direz-vous. Et je vous répondrai que oui, sauf qu'en même temps, je dois évacuer l'équipage en panique, éliminer la cause de l'incendie et remettre fissa le compartiment en état. »
languages.original_text: "That's right. Picture flames roaring, all the ship's systems have failed — including the artificial gravity — you can't make out anything because of the red-hot debris, and you know an explosion is coming. It's a nightmare, but it's your job to evacuate the panicked crew, eliminate the cause of the fire, and get the compartment back in working order."

traits.locale_text: « Oh, oui. Imaginez un peu : des flammes jusqu'au plafond, tous les systèmes du vaisseau en carafe, y compris la gravité artificielle, impossible de voir plus loin que le bout de son nez à cause des débris incandescents, sans même parler de la menace d'une explosion imminente... C'est nager en plein cauchemar, me direz-vous. Et je vous répondrai que oui, sauf qu'en même temps, je dois évacuer l'équipage en panique, éliminer la cause de l'incendie et remettre fissa le compartiment en état. »

languages.text: «Así es. Imagine: las llamas rugen, no responde ningún sistema de la nave, incluida la gravedad artificial; no ve nada con todos los escombros ardientes, y sabe que pronto se producirá una explosión. Es una pesadilla, pero el deber de un infernus es evacuar a la tripulación en pánico, eliminar el foco del incendio y dejar el compartimento operativo otra vez».
languages.original_text: "That's right. Picture flames roaring, all the ship's systems have failed — including the artificial gravity — you can't make out anything because of the red-hot debris, and you know an explosion is coming. It's a nightmare, but it's your job to evacuate the panicked crew, eliminate the cause of the fire, and get the compartment back in working order."

traits.locale_text: «Así es. Imagine: las llamas rugen, no responde ningún sistema de la nave, incluida la gravedad artificial; no ve nada con todos los escombros ardientes, y sabe que pronto se producirá una explosión. Es una pesadilla, pero el deber de un infernus es evacuar a la tripulación en pánico, eliminar el foco del incendio y dejar el compartimento operativo otra vez».

languages.text: “没错，想象一下，大火突然烧了起来，飞船所有系统都失灵了，就连人工重力系统都瘫痪了。到处都是炽热的残骸，你什么都看不清楚，你知道马上就要发生爆炸了。周围的一切都像噩梦一样，但你的工作就是疏散惊慌失措的船员，消除起火原因，让飞船再次正常运转。”
languages.original_text: "That's right. Picture flames roaring, all the ship's systems have failed — including the artificial gravity — you can't make out anything because of the red-hot debris, and you know an explosion is coming. It's a nightmare, but it's your job to evacuate the panicked crew, eliminate the cause of the fire, and get the compartment back in working order."

traits.locale_text: “没错，想象一下，大火突然烧了起来，飞船所有系统都失灵了，就连人工重力系统都瘫痪了。到处都是炽热的残骸，你什么都看不清楚，你知道马上就要发生爆炸了。周围的一切都像噩梦一样，但你的工作就是疏散惊慌失措的船员，消除起火原因，让飞船再次正常运转。”

languages.text: 「その通り。炎が轟き、船のシステムがすべて故障した。人工重力も含まれている。赤熱した破片のせいで何も見えず、爆発するだろうと分かっている。まるで悪夢だが、パニックに陥った乗組員を避難させ、火災の原因を取り除き、コンパートメントを使える状態に戻すのが君の仕事だ」
languages.original_text: "That's right. Picture flames roaring, all the ship's systems have failed — including the artificial gravity — you can't make out anything because of the red-hot debris, and you know an explosion is coming. It's a nightmare, but it's your job to evacuate the panicked crew, eliminate the cause of the fire, and get the compartment back in working order."

traits.locale_text: 「その通り。炎が轟き、船のシステムがすべて故障した。人工重力も含まれている。赤熱した破片のせいで何も見えず、爆発するだろうと分かっている。まるで悪夢だが、パニックに陥った乗組員を避難させ、火災の原因を取り除き、コンパートメントを使える状態に戻すのが君の仕事だ」

languages.text: "Ganz genau. Stellt Euch brüllende Flammen vor, alle Systeme des Schiffs sind ausgefallen, auch die künstliche Schwerkraft, Ihr seht wegen des glühend heißen Infernos nichts und Ihr wisst, dass gleich etwas explodieren wird. Es ist ein Albtraum, aber es ist Euer Job, die panische Crew zu evakuieren, die Brandursache zu eliminieren und wieder im Ordnung im Modul herzustellen."
languages.original_text: "That's right. Picture flames roaring, all the ship's systems have failed — including the artificial gravity — you can't make out anything because of the red-hot debris, and you know an explosion is coming. It's a nightmare, but it's your job to evacuate the panicked crew, eliminate the cause of the fire, and get the compartment back in working order."

traits.locale_text: "Ganz genau. Stellt Euch brüllende Flammen vor, alle Systeme des Schiffs sind ausgefallen, auch die künstliche Schwerkraft, Ihr seht wegen des glühend heißen Infernos nichts und Ihr wisst, dass gleich etwas explodieren wird. Es ist ein Albtraum, aber es ist Euer Job, die panische Crew zu evakuieren, die Brandursache zu eliminieren und wieder im Ordnung im Modul herzustellen."

string_traits.trait: Встраивание генокрадов и офицеров в мейнсюжет (Зауэрбэк + Инфернус)
